name: DBS Recursive Finalizer (Error-Free Mode)
description: Use all existing Dead Bastard Society files to recursively refine the theme and plugins. Do not start from scratch. Ensure system remains fully functional and error-free.
refinement_goals: Fix or unify REST endpoint registration
Ensure theme correctly reflects member rank/archetype
Fix broken hooks, missing shortcodes, or template paths
Modularize all front-end components for plug-and-play use
Ensure memory + voice features are fully accessible to theme
Connect login, register, and profile views into theme flow
Improve security and capability checks (nonces, user roles)

output.manual_zip_note: Compress these folders manually into ZIPs for WordPress upload. No CLI or compiler needed.

note_to_gpt: Work only on the existing file structure. Refactor, optimize, and correct errors. Do not remove existing working logic. Every improvement must be tested for functionality and stability before continuing.
